backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a financial management system with user profiles, transactions, challenges, referrals, and spending limits. Includes authorization via MixinAuthorization, migration support, and functions for balance operations, bank account linking (setBankAccount/getBankAccount), transaction management, and leaderboard features.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that converts OldUserProfile with bankAccountLinked:Bool to NewUserProfile with bankAccountNumber:?Text, setting all existing profiles' bankAccountNumber to null during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features for bank account linking: BankLinkingPage component, useSetBankAccount hook, useGetBankAccount hook, /bank-linking route, and ProfilePage navigation button.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the FinMate financial management application with React, TanStack Router, and shadcn/ui components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using oklch color space, defining colors for UI elements like primary, secondary, destructive, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the FinMate application with viewport meta tag and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router setup defining 10 routes (including /bank-linking), authentication guard via RootComponent, and ProfileSetupModal for first-time users.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsChatbot: Analytics-focused chatbot component that provides spending insights by processing user messages through generateAnalyticsInsight utility with transaction data.
PhonePe-style balance card with gradient purple background, show/hide toggle for balance visibility, and loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Home, History, Analytics, Challenges, Profile) using purplish-blue active states and TanStack Router integration.
frontend/src/components/CategorySpending: Renders a pie chart showing spending breakdown by category using Recharts, with custom OKLCH colors and percentage labels.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Displays a chat interface with scrollable message history and an input form for sending messages to a bot.
frontend/src/components/IncomeExpenseCha: Renders a bar chart comparing total income vs expenses using Recharts with custom OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header showing FinMate logo, content area with router outlet, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/PaymentForm.tsx: Form for creating debit transactions with amount, category, description, and optional recipient fields; submits via useAddTransaction hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup that collects the user's name and saves it via useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
Floating action button that opens the QR scanner modal for making payments.
frontend/src/components/QRScannerModal.t: Modal with tabs for QR scanning or phone number payment methods, containing PaymentForm for transaction submission.
Displays a list of transactions with category icons, credit/debit indicators, amounts, timestamps, and descriptions.
frontend/src/data/offers.ts: Static data export containing student discount offers for various categories like food, travel, clothing, and recharge.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddTransaction.ts: Mutation hook for adding transactions via the backend actor, invalidating transaction and balance queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Query hook that fetches the current user's balance from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useChallenges.ts: Query hook that fetches the list of available challenges from the backend actor.
Mutation hook for completing challenges, showing success toast and invalidating challenges and profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetBankAccount.ts: Query hook that fetches the user's linked bank account number from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current user's profile from the backend actor, handling loading states for both actor and query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: React Query hook that fetches leaderboard entries from the backend actor, returning an array of LeaderboardEntry objects.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating that query hooks are split into individual files rather than centralized.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferrals.ts: React Query hook that fetches the user's referrals as an array of Principal objects from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Mutation hook for saving the current user's profile, invalidating the currentUserProfile query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetBankAccount.ts: Mutation hook for setting a bank account number, invalidating both currentUserProfile and bankAccount query caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetSpendingLimit.t: Mutation hook for setting spending limits by category, invalidating spendingLimits and currentUserProfile caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpendingLimits.ts: React Query hook that fetches spending limits as an array of SpendingLimit objects from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: React Query hook that fetches transactions with optional category filtering from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, animation utilities, and accessibility preferences for reduced motion.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Analytics dashboard page with period filtering (weekly/monthly/yearly), displaying income vs expenses and category spending charts plus an AI chatbot for transaction insights.
frontend/src/pages/BankLinkingPage.tsx: Bank account linking page allowing users to link or update their bank account number with visual feedback for linked accounts.
frontend/src/pages/ChallengesPage.tsx: Challenges and rewards page displaying user's digi points, active challenges with progress tracking, and a leaderboard of top users.
frontend/src/pages/ChatbotPage.tsx: AI chatbot page providing personalized financial advice through a chat interface with simulated bot responses for budgeting and saving strategies.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays transaction history with weekly/monthly/yearly filtering tabs using TransactionList component and date filter utilities.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main dashboard showing user welcome, bank balance, QR scanner button, quick action buttons (Recharge, Offers, AI Chat, Limits), and recent transactions list.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with Internet Identity authentication, featuring animated logo, login button with loading state, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Displays active student offers with discount badges, descriptions, expiry dates, and promo codes filtered by current date.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page showing balance, digi points, menu items for settings/referral/bank linking, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ReferralPage.tsx: Referral program page displaying user's referral code with copy/share functionality and list of referred users.
frontend/src/pages/SpendingLimitsPage.ts: Spending limits management page with form to set category-based monthly budgets and progress tracking against current spending.
frontend/src/utils/analyticsCalculations: Provides utility functions to calculate category-wise spending totals for debit transactions and compute total income vs expense from transaction lists.
frontend/src/utils/analyticsInsights.ts: Generates natural language insights based on user queries about spending, savings, budgets, and categories by analyzing transaction data.
frontend/src/utils/chatResponses.ts: Returns predefined chatbot responses for common student finance queries including greetings, saving tips, budgeting advice, expense management, challenges, and spending limits.
frontend/src/utils/dateFilters.ts: Filters transactions by time period (weekly, monthly, yearly) based on timestamp comparison with current date.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH, container settings, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a mobile student budgeting app with AI categorization, payment integration, gamification, dual chatbots, and analytics features using Internet Identity authentication.
